title: Ecobee’s latest Nest Thermostat competitor has a built-in air quality monitor and radar
content:
Ecobee this week revealed a new batch of smart thermostats which, as usual, include support for Google Assistant among other things. Also new in this year’s Ecobee thermostat lineup is the addition of a built-in air quality monitor and a new radar sensor, just like Google’s thermostat.

more…

The post Ecobee’s latest Nest Thermostat competitor has a built-in air quality monitor and radar appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The latest Ecobee Smart Thermostat adds support for a built-in air quality monitor, as well as radar sensing instead of IR.
